caption: Water flooded into the cabin, and it began seeping down the stairs. A man and a woman found themselves trapped next to a railing. They struggled through the water, only to discover that the iron door ahead was locked. Just in the nick of time, another person arrived and used a key to unlock the door. The water was about to engulf them, but they were fortunate to climb to safety. On the deck, a group of people hurriedly boarded lifeboats, while a team of crew members directed them. In the hall, many gentlemen dressed in black suits remained. The captain headed towards the bridge, which was already submerged.
